about_the_game:
We are going to tell you a story of adventure, betrayal, friendship and tacos. Like any Mexican telenovela. Lucha Masters: Mighty Lucha.



This is an action game in which four players can immerse themselves in frenetic battles because of the amazing gameplay, memorable characters, and retro 8-bit aesthetics.
This game is entirely inspired by the authentic legends and myths of Mexico. The music, the colors, the enemies and the levels will make you vibrate with its impressive atmosphere full of Lucha Libre to become a Luchador.

Play alongside Lucho, a small axolotl with a great mission: Defeat the evil IRONMOL-cajete, break piñatas, eat Tacos and be fit (Maybe that's the hardest thing to get).



Have great adventures alone or in co-op mode, crossing through various colorful places until you face the evil IRONMol-cajete(It's a robot with IA and it made the piñatas evil, Can you imagine that? An evil piñata? what a sad sadness).

If you're tired of those sadness, fix it by hitting your friend with a chair or many other things(We say it in the game, not that you do it in person) there's a Lucha Mode, where 4 players can grab each other uncontrollably.



Face evil, create a revolution, overthrow the system, eat a lot of tacos, have fun and become a LEGEND, never forget that.
detailed_description:
We are going to tell you a story of adventure, betrayal, friendship and tacos. Like any Mexican telenovela. Lucha Masters: Mighty Lucha.



This is an action game in which four players can immerse themselves in frenetic battles because of the amazing gameplay, memorable characters, and retro 8-bit aesthetics.
This game is entirely inspired by the authentic legends and myths of Mexico. The music, the colors, the enemies and the levels will make you vibrate with its impressive atmosphere full of Lucha Libre to become a Luchador.

Play alongside Lucho, a small axolotl with a great mission: Defeat the evil IRONMOL-cajete, break piñatas, eat Tacos and be fit (Maybe that's the hardest thing to get).



Have great adventures alone or in co-op mode, crossing through various colorful places until you face the evil IRONMol-cajete(It's a robot with IA and it made the piñatas evil, Can you imagine that? An evil piñata? what a sad sadness).

If you're tired of those sadness, fix it by hitting your friend with a chair or many other things(We say it in the game, not that you do it in person) there's a Lucha Mode, where 4 players can grab each other uncontrollably.



Face evil, create a revolution, overthrow the system, eat a lot of tacos, have fun and become a LEGEND, never forget that.
name: Lucha Masters: Mighty Lucha

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 750 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB

short_description: Lucha Masters: Mighty Lucha is an action game in which four players can have great adventures alone or in co-op mode because of the amazing gameplay, memorable characters, and retro 8-bit aesthetics with all the succulent Mexican culture.
